bdi4jade.plan

Interface Plan

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MetadataElement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPlan, DefaultPlan

    public interface Plan
extends MetadataElement
    This interfaces represents the plan abstraction. It defines the goals that the plan can achieve, in which context, and it able to create an instance of plan body to be executed.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Plan.EndState
      This enumeration represents the possible end states of a plan execution.

      Verifies if a given goal can be achieved by this plan.

      Verifies if the message can be processed by this plan.
      PlanBody createPlanBody()
      Instantiate the plan body of this plan, which is an implementation of the PlanBody interface.
      java.lang.String getId()
      Returns the id of this plan.
      PlanLibrary getPlanLibrary()
      Returns the plan library with which this plan is associated.

      Verifies if the current context is valid for this plan execution.

    • Method Detail

      • canAchieve

        boolean canAchieve(Goal goal)
        Verifies if a given goal can be achieved by this plan.
        Parameters:
        goal - the goal to be verified.
        Returns:
        true if the given goal can be achieved by this plan, false otherwise.

      • canProcess

        boolean canProcess(jade.lang.acl.ACLMessage message)
        Verifies if the message can be processed by this plan.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if this plan can process the message, false otherwise.

      • createPlanBody

        PlanBody createPlanBody()
                 throws PlanInstantiationException
        Instantiate the plan body of this plan, which is an implementation of the PlanBody interface.
        Returns:
        the instantiated plan body.
        Throws:
        PlanInstantiationException - if an error occurred during the instantiation process.

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        Returns the id of this plan.
        Returns:
        the id

      • getPlanLibrary

        PlanLibrary getPlanLibrary()
        Returns the plan library with which this plan is associated.
        Returns:
        the planLibrary.

      • isContextApplicable

        boolean isContextApplicable(Goal goal)
        Verifies if the current context is valid for this plan execution.
        Parameters:
        goal - the goal to be achieved whose conditions may be tested to verify the applicability of this plan.
        Returns:
        true if the plan can be executed in the current context, false otherwise.

      • setPlanLibrary

        void setPlanLibrary(PlanLibrary planLibrary)
        Sets the plan library with which this plan is associated.
        Parameters:
        planLibrary - the planLibrary to set.
